name: Ashley Falk
text: The pizza I ordered was cold. Also, wasn't cut at all. Probably should check that before it goes out for delivery. Delivery was on time and the lady who gave it to me was nice, that's the only good I have from my experience.

name: Jeremy Martin
text: Marcos pizza apparently closed this location.  When you call the message tells you to visit their other locations.    Really liked their pizza, but the amount of pizza I consume cannot on its own keep them open.

name: Jason C
text: My daughter loves the cheese they use on pizzas, and the crust is very tasty as well.

name: Barbara Kreutzer
text: Delicious! With great every day prices

name: Bill Williams
text: Really yummy pizza & you get a free movie rental with your order.

name: daniel odriscoll
text: I have been in Muncie working for six months now everyone I work with kept telling me I needed to try the pizza king because itâ€™s yhe best I would have to disagree the pizza I got from Marcos was so much better and fresher tasting. I would â€¦More

name: Will Cooper
text: Great pizza option.  Always been very satisfied with their pizza.  Only had to wait one time for my carry-out order, for which they were very apologetic, otherwise they have been very fast.

name: Butch Duey
text: Good food and price good also

name: Birder Reese
text: Tried this for the first time Christmas Day.  I thought their pizza was as good as any in Muncie with the possible exception of Pizza King.  Might even have been better is several respects.  Crust was better and had more toppings.  We all enjoyed it.

name: Ken Ring
text: Sandwiches are good, but they close early (before posted time.) They list my business for good.

name: Revelation 20:15
text: I was hesitant to give Marco's Pizza any of my hard-earned dollars because there's already such a cornucopia of pizzeria's in Muncie to choose from, but I'm glad that I stopped by and gave them a chance. I've always used their online â€¦More

name: Kyle Northcutt
text: Awesome pizza, great prices, free movie rentals.

name: Jeanette Smith
text: I love the cheese pizza. They have pizza and movie deals. They deliver which is a plus. They offer coupons and have special. Great for when you don't want to cook.

name: Shane Kirkpatrick
text: Best pizza in Muncie I have had yet and there pretty cheap

name: Alma Mele
text: Best pizza, great service

name: Teresa Reid
text: Great employees and wonderful experience as always

name: March Clovers
text: If you like Pizza Hut, Dominos, Papa John's, or Pizza King...Marcos will be 10x better

name: Alex Sizemore
text: Marcos isn't trying to offer everything, so they're still good on their present course.  Keep it up, be and we'll keep coming in.

name: Drew Skipper
text: Above average pizza. Prices a little ridiculous. Movie and a pizza deal is pretty nice

name: Dentric L. Vance
text: Very Good Pizza.  I think its the sauce.  Best pizza besides Pizza King.

name: Derek Long
text: So called to make an order as we drove there.  We held 5 minutes after being placed on hold on phone and expected them to be busy.  No body was there.  The guy working was not on another call.  My wife walks in to order since he atill hasnt â€¦More

name: coffelt25 productions
text: The food was delicious and clean thank you fast service manger was good passed very clean

name: Deloris Andrews
text: Good place to go for quick pizza

name: Chelsey Jones
text: I've ordered here several times and they've had amazing pizza and customer service each time!

name: Stephanie Gilyard
text: Very nice and friendly customer service who didnt hesitate to give me the run down of their specials... Food was very good I ordered a  Large pizza,  cheezy bread and wings!!! 5Stars in my eyes!!!ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š

text: if a big pizza is worth $ 10 why did I pay in a media18? with a drink, and my drink did not come, I am completely dissatisfied, detail, was less than a minute of delivery ..
